comments.creator: cedricv@neonux.com
comments.author: cedricv@neonux.com
comments.text:
Use case:
- using Style Editor on Bugzilla, you'll see the alternate CSS style sheets in the list (eg. "Dusk")
- you edit that "Dusk" style sheet, you do not notice any change in the page since your current page style is not "Dusk"


The Style Editor should automatically switch the page style to "Dusk" while you're editing it.
